title: Remittance transfer confirmations (Western Union, MoneyGram)
dataVerified: Sender, recipient, amount, fees, exchange rate, MTCN/reference
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake remittance receipts (common fraud in immigrant communities). Domain binding verifies remittance provider. Tamper-evident transfer proof. Regulatory compliance (Dodd-Frank 1073, CFPB Remittance Rule). Recipient verification before pickup.
